text:
Dr Lakkumar Fernando🧑‍⚕️ removed as the board member of the National Medicines Regulatory Authority. He is the 7th person removed from the board since the #COVID19 crisis. It's believed the reason for this removal is the delay in approving the #China's🇨🇳 Sinopharm #Vaccine💉.

#lka https://t.co/R39GVAo9TE
